duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare wafers for experimentation, including cleaning, loading, and reactor preparation.
Operate scanning electron microscope (SEM) for cross-section, top-view analysis, and imaging.
Record process conditions, experimental observations, and thin-film evaluations.
Order equipment and supplies, coordinate with vendors and purchasing, and perform routine maintenance procedures.
Coordinate instrument repair and maintenance, set up equipment for experiments, and use quantitative wafer evaluation and process instrumentation knowledge.
